body.description: We admit, the outdoors smell great. But with our Bounce Outdoor Fresh fabric softener dryer sheets you also get fewer wrinkles, way less static cling, repel lint and hair while keeping your fabrics soft - all on top of an outdoor fresh scent. Ahhhhh, now that’s a breath of fresh air.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fight Wrinkles Bounce dryer sheets show wrinkles who’s boss. Tossing a sheet in the dryer keeps clothes looking their best and reduces wrinkles from making embarrassing appearances at big meetings or important events. Stops Static Bounce dryer sheets help prevent static build up that occurs in the dryer. Now you can look and feel your best because Bounce dryer sheets keep you virtually static-free. Freshens & Softens Bounce dryer sheets give clothes a fresh and exhilarating scent straight out of the dryer. Plus, clothes feel noticeably soft. So long, stale laundry smell. How To Use Bounce Dryer Sheets 1. Toss laundry in the dryer. 2. Toss a Bounce sheet in the dryer. 3. Toss static, wrinkles, and odor goodbye.

Bounce Outdoor Fresh Scented Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets Bounce Free & Gentle Unscented Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets for Sensitive Skin Bounce Fresh Linen Scented Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets Bounce with Febreze Scent Spring & Renewal Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets Bounce Sweet Dreams Scented Fabric Softener Dryer Sheets Iron Less ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fights Static ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Softens ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Freshens ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ Free of Dyes and Perfumes ✓

How Many Bounce Dryer Sheets Do I Need? Toss in 2 Bounce dryer sheets for your average loads to iron less, fight more static, repel more lint & pet hair, and add more softness & freshness. How Many Bounce Dryer Sheets Do I Need? Toss in 1 Bounce dryer sheet for your small/medium loads to iron less, fight more static, repel more lint & pet hair, and add more softness & freshness. How Many Bounce Dryer Sheets Do I Need? Toss in 3 Bounce dryer sheets for your extra large loads to iron less, fight more static, repel more lint & pet hair, and add more softness & freshness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST Fabric Softener. Ever.
reviews.reviewText: My mom used Bounce when I was growing up and because of that, it has always been included in my laundry adventures. The smell is delicious, but not overpowering. As the price has slowly climbed over the years, I have tried generic brands. Every store brand I've tried has not come anywhere close to the predictable results of Bounce. When I got rid of my ancient washer and dryer a few years ago in favor of new HE machines (big mistake!), I changed over to a well-known, liquid, blue fabric softener based on the recommendation of the salesman. WHOOPS! I wound up throwing over half that bottle away - and returned to Bounce.Bounce makes my clothes soft and they smell good. I will admit to not fully knowing about static cling until I changed brands of fabric softener, but upon crawling back to Bounce, every single time I was quickly reminded how static cling doesn't have to play even the slightest role in your laundry, or life. The price I've found here on Amazon absolutely blows away the prices demanded by local stores - we're talking about paying a THIRD of local prices. If I can buy three of these on Amazon for the cost of one locally - including shipping - I'm sold! I truly don't know why anyone would waste their money on another fabric softener...Bounce is that good. I have a lifetime of experience being surrounded by fabrics dried with it...and that won't change anytime soon. When you find a great product, you stick with it. That's why I highly recommend Bounce!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product & price!
reviews.reviewText: Product as always is great, but it never gave me an option to request shipping in an Amazon box. The bounce box was tossed in the snow & the box got wet along with some of the sheets wet, I was able to still use them after drying them out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use once in dryer and recycle!
reviews.reviewText: I like the outdoor fresh scent as it is soft. I have discovered many "hacks" over the years and I no longer throw them out after a single load in the dryer. Recycle the bounce sheets! I have found that they are a great way to get bug marks off your car without damaging the paint (they work well when they are wet). I am horrible at marking my clothes with deodorant so I keep used sheets in my bathroom and rub the fabric with short, quick strokes. I also wipe my hairbrush as I found it helps significantly to reduce hair static. Soak a used dryer sheet with nail polish remover to remove glitter polish from your nails. I use the recycled sheets to wipe down the washer and dryer as they tend to be magnets for the lint. I also use the recycled sheets to remove the heavy pollen in the spring when washing the windows. In addition, the recycled sheets are used consistently in my household on baseboards, door frames, dashboard, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used bounce for over 45+ years!
reviews.reviewText: Used bounce for over 45+ years! I can remember using these when I was a little kid!! Yes we did our own laundry when we were toddlers. Great stuff, not good for eating. I use these also on my motorcycle to repel rodents, apparently they dont like fresh smells!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells so darn good!
reviews.reviewText: i have used a few different brands of dryer sheets over the years. honestly, some do a better job than these, but many do much worse. i like the bounce sheets because my clothes come out soft and static-free, but they don't leave an overwhelming scent of lilac or jasmine on my man-clothing. also, they are not over-priced like some of their competitors. and, while the price of this 240-count box is not a giant discount over the 40- or 80-count sizes you can get in the stores, the convenience factor of the big box makes these worth buying.
